thoughts.text: I can use the browse_website command to explore a website that I found using the google command.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the browse_website command will allow me to explore a website that I found using the google command. This will help me quickly find the information I need to achieve my goals and interests.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the google command to search for a website that I want to learn more about
- Use the browse_website command to explore the website
- Use the get_hyperlinks command to get a summary of the hyperlinks on the website
- Decide which links are most relevant to my goals and interests
- Use the browse_website command to explore the most relevant links
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time exploring websites and make sure to balance it with my other goals. I should also be mindful of the credibility and accuracy of the information I find on websites.
thoughts.speak: I will now use the browse_website command to explore a website that I found using the google command. Which website would you like me to explore?

args.question: What information are you interested in learning about on this website?
